org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.simple

Class DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.simple.DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransportConnectionBuilder<Socket>

    public class DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder
extends Object
implements TransportConnectionBuilder<Socket>
    Builder to create a TransportConnection based on an underlying socket.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder

        public DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder(boolean server,
                                       TcgProtocolBindingIdentifier tProtocol,
                                       TransportWriter<TransportMessage> writer,
                                       TransportReader<TransportMessage> reader)
        Creates a builder for a TransportConnection object using the specified reader and writer for serialization.
        Parameters:
        server - the flag to determin if the build creates connections for an NAA or NAR
        tProtocol - the transport protocol identifier
        writer - the transport protocol serializer
        reader - the transport protocol parser

    • Method Detail

      • isServerConnectionBuilder

        public boolean isServerConnectionBuilder()
        Returns whether the builder is building connections for an NAA or NAR.
        Returns:
        the connection type to build (true = NAA, false = NAR)

        the DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder for fluent use
        Throws:

      • addNegotiator

        public DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder addNegotiator(Negotiator neg)
        Adds a negotiator to negotiate the protocol version for the connection to be build. Some negotiators may only be used for one connection and are not reusable. Therefore you must add a negotiator explicitly for every connection to be build with this builder. If no negotiator is set this implementation creates a DefaultNegotiationInitiator or DefaultNegotiationResponder accordingly.
        Parameters:
        neg - the negotiator to use for the next connection to be build
        Returns:
        the DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder for fluent use

      • addAuthenticator

        public DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder addAuthenticator(Authenticator auth)
        Adds an authenticator to authenticate the connection to be build. Some authenticator can only be used for one connection and are not reusable. Therefore you must add the authenticator explicitly for every connection to be build with this builder (e.g. SASL based authenticators). If no authenticator is set this implementation creates a DefaultAuthenticationClient or DefaultAuthenticationServer accordingly.
        Parameters:
        auth - the authenticator to use for the next connection to be build
        Returns:
        the DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder for fluent use
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if authenticator does not match the connection type (server or client)

      • toConnection

                               boolean selfInitiated,
                               Socket underlying)
        Description copied from interface: TransportConnectionBuilder
        Creates a TransportConnection with the given parameters and a defined ID.

        Parameters:

        selfInitiated - the parameter, which identifies, if the connection was initiated by this side

        Returns:
